Alternate Contact: Debbie Cholette, Community Life Centre Assistant, Community Life Centre; Phone: 250.765.3450
Volunteer Coordinator: Tamara Faitala, Volunteer Coordinator; Phone: 250.860.2329 ext 333; Email: volunteer@kelsa.ca
Service Details: Works in partnership with the community to help families whose income and assets place them below the poverty line and those who are in one-time financial crisis due to loss of work or unforeseen emergency
Eligibility: Single adults should contact Victory Life Fellowship for details on the Annual Christmas Day Dinner held at Parkinson Recreation Centre
How to Apply: Call 250.765.3450 for further informationMust have 2 pieces of ID for each adult, such as a Driver's Licence, Birth Certificate, BCID or Care Card- one piece must be photo ID- 1 piece of ID for each child, such as Birth Certificate, Care Card or BCID)- proof of residence, such as a utility bill or mail * proof of rent, such as a rental agreement or rent receipt- proof of income-pay/income assistance stub or income tax assessment/summary
Address & Map: 200 Rutland Rd SKelowna, BC     V1X 2Z5View MapQuest Map
Major Intersection: Rutland Rd S and Gray Rd
